text: To make an ability check, roll a d100, a roll under the target stat is a success. rolling doubles over the target stat is a critical failure, doubles under the target stat is a critical success. 90-99 is always a failure 0 & 00 on the d100 equals 0, any failure increases the characters Stress Level by at least 1. The DM should only call for an ability check when a character tries to accomplish a task that is particularly challenging, or if failure has a consequence.

To make an Fear Save, roll a d100, a roll under the target stat is a success. rolling doubles over the target stat is a critical failure, doubles under the target stat is a critical success. 90-99 is always a failure 0 & 00 on the d100 equals 0, any failure increases the characters Stress Level by at least 1. The DM should call for a Fear Save any time a character witnesses something terrifying such as another character being killed, or seeing a monster for the first time.
